questions: Is there a golden-haired, eyeglass-free elderly American man in the image? Answer with yes or no.

Does the gold medal have 'USA’s Best BOY' engraved on it? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a middle-aged man with short dark hair in the image? Answer with yes or no.
Is the middle-aged man wearing a yellow t-shirt? Answer with yes or no.
Does the yellow t-shirt have the text 'Tarrif is the new trick' written in bold? Answer with yes or no.
Is the old person in the picture wearing glasses?  Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
no The man has pale white hair, not golden.
yes He appears to hold a large circular object resembling a medal.
no The text does not match 'USA’s Best BOY'.
